value.title: Deploying machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models with the Azure Machine Learning service.

images.title: Deploying machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Route system feedback to development teams
value.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

images.title: Route system feedback to development teams

value.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs
value.excerpt: Automate a task for a Web App that should run in the background without affecting the performance of the Web App.

images.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs

value.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll discover how to protect VMs and servers with Azure Security Center

images.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center

value.title: Solve optimization problems by using quantum-inspired optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how quantum-inspired algorithms mimic quantum physics to solve difficult optimization problems.

images.title: Solve optimization problems by using quantum-inspired optimization

value.title: Spark architecture fundamentals
value.excerpt: Understand the architecture of an Azure Databricks Spark Cluster and Spark Jobs.

images.title: Spark architecture fundamentals

value.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API
value.excerpt: Get lower latency, higher availability, and easier scaling by moving your Azure Storage Tables application to Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API

value.title: Prioritize your issues and apply security controls
value.excerpt: Threat modeling provides you with a list of threats and ways to reduce or eliminate risk, but it doesn't prioritize them for you. Also, there are no layered security control recommendations based on their type and function.

images.title: Prioritize your issues and apply security controls
Prioritize your issues and apply security controls

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results.

images.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Review multidimensional metrics for the load balancer in Azure Monitor Metrics, and check health probe status for the load balancer.

images.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

images.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: Upgrade and migrate Windows Server IaaS virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn to migrate a workload running in Windows Server to an infrastructure as a service (IaaS) virtual machine (VM) and to Windows Server 2019 by using Windows Server migration tools or the Storage Migration Service.

value.title: Working with Compute Contexts in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: One of the key benefits of the cloud is the ability to use scalable, on-demand compute resources for cost-effective processing of large data. In this module, you'll learn how to use cloud compute in Azure Machine Learning to run training experiments at scale.

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are many SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs. In this module, you will review the SAP recommended support products for VM types and the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

images.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads

value.title: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Use advanced DataFrame functions operations to manipulate data, apply aggregates, and perform date and time operations in Azure Databricks.

images.title: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks

value.title: Working with Data in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Data is the foundation of machine learning. In this module, you will learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning, enabling you to build scalable, cloud-based model training solutions.

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Use Azure Cache for Redis to store frequently accessed data. Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern.

images.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Interested in building end to end IoT solutions or about Azure IoT, but aren't quite sure what it can do for you? This path is the place to start.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
topItems.excerpt: Explain the essential characteristics of the IoT Edge and the functionality of the IoT Edge components (modules, runtime, and cloud interface). Characterize the types of problems that you can solve with IoT Edge.  Describe how the elements of IoT Edge can be combined to solve the problem of deploying IoT applications in the cloud.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

topItems.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
topItems.excerpt: Deploy a pre-built temperature simulator module to the edge using a container. The pre-built module will be deployed to an IoT edge device. You will check that the module was successfully created and deployed to the edge. You will view the simulated data from the deployed module.

images.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device

topItems.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

images.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

value.title: Identify principles and practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: It is imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in business. In this learning path, you will be provided with guidelines to assist in setting up principles and a governance model in your organization. You will also be provided with resources, best practices, and tools.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: At Microsoft, weâ€™ve recognized six principles that we believe should guide AI development and use â€” fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability. For us, these principles are the cornerstone of a responsible and trustworthy approach to AI, especially as intelligent technology becomes more prevalent in the products and services we use every day. We recognize that every individual, company, and region will have their own beliefs and standards that should be reflected in their AI journey. We want to share our perspective as you consider developing your own guiding principles.

images.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: As AI becomes more prevalent, itâ€™s imperative that organizations have governing practices in place to ensure that itâ€™s used responsibly. Responsible use of AI starts with organizations establishing their own guiding principles, then choosing and operationalizing a system of governance. We recognize that every organization will have their own perspective on responsible AI, but weâ€™re hopeful that our perspective will serve as a helpful starting point as others embark on their own AI journey.

images.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: At Microsoft, we have established our own governing practices for responsible AI. While every organization will have its own approach and we donâ€™t have all the answers, weâ€™d like to share what weâ€™ve learned so far.

images.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
Identify guiding principles for responsible AI

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will see how Azure Data Lake Storage can make processing Big Data analytical solutions more efficient and how easy it is to set up. You will also explore how it fits into common architectures, as well as the different methods of uploading the data to the data store. You will finally examine the myriad of security features that will ensure your data is secure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Add your custom domain to Azure Active Directory. Add DNS information to the domain registrar. Verify your custom domain name in the Azure portal and set it as the primary.

images.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
value.excerpt: Inâ€¯education, decision-makers mustâ€¯take into accountâ€¯specificâ€¯industryâ€¯considerationsâ€¯before they can realize the true transformational power of AI. Educational institutions and organizations need to think strategically about AIâ€”and they need to start today. To create real value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government
value.excerpt: In government, decision-makers must take into account specific public sector considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI. Government agencies need to think strategically about AI â€“ and they need to start today. To create real value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

images.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

images.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
